altername_name: アタマでDO! こてんこてんこ
name: Atama de Do! Kotencotenco
overview: Atama de DO! Kotencotenco (アタマでDO! こてんこてんこ) is a mini-game collection/music game based on the Kotencotenco manga series. The game combines animation with live action. It's super weird. Most parts can be played without knowing Japanese.
